title: crashes , lags , features not respons
body: its happen only to me ? im starting game than the server crash cant relog found myself in leaverbuster , when i succeed to start a game lags , when i finish game cant see the end game chat / graphes need to skip the page evry time .. something wrong with my game or its general problem???

replies.body: Are you getting any error messages during this crash, and when is it happening exactly?  We can't remove a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty, but I want to help prevent future ones.  Let me know with some more info!
the lag is a horrible thing, the best riot will do is tell you to do a speed test other then that idk because that's all they did with me.
